scan_table_check.description: A Flow or Subflow should never depend on specific data records. This follows the doctrine that no code should ever depend on data. See chapter "Data vs. Code" in the whitepaper.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Flow or Subflow depends on data
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Modify the Flow or Subflow logic so that it does not depend on specific data records. If specific data records (users, groups, departments, etc.) are relevant for the flow logic, these must be loaded dynamically or configured explicitly - e.g. using System Properties.
scan_table_check.short_description: A Flow or Subflow must not depend on data
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Flow or Subflow depends on data
